* BrightBlade watched as Perndabot avoided another tree, glad to see that at 
least he was no longer getting damaged thanks to her.
She heard his question, shrugging her shoulders. *

� A mega-cycle, maybe more. Depends what I can get my hands on.�

* She then looked up at him, wondering what his reaction would be. Her arms 
getting a bit tired from holding the stasis orb to her chest, simply 
dropping then so that they held the ball at about the height of her hips.
They were almost there, time to begin thinking of a possible escape route if 
it all came down to the worst.*
